member.summary: Lists the possible modes for , which controls which pages the viewer will display.

member.name: F:PDFTron.SilverDox.Controls.DocumentViewer.DisplayModes.AllPages
member.summary: All pages will be visible.

member.name: F:PDFTron.SilverDox.Controls.DocumentViewer.DisplayModes.SinglePage
member.summary: Only the current page will be visible. Intended to be used where the viewer's ItemsPanelTemplate is a vertically orriented stack panel, with the HorizontalAlignment and VerticalAlignment attributes set to Center. This is the default ItemsPanelTemplate.

member.name: F:PDFTron.SilverDox.Controls.DocumentViewer.DisplayModes.DualPageFacing
member.summary: Up to two pages will be visible, with an odd numbered page rendered first. Intended to be used where the viewer's ItemsPanelTemplate is set to the FacingPanel layout Panel found in the ReaderControl sample project, with the CoverFacing attribute set to false. (SilverDoxSdk\Samples\ReaderControl\Utility\FacingPanel.cs)

member.name: F:PDFTron.SilverDox.Controls.DocumentViewer.DisplayModes.DualPageCoverFacing
member.summary: Up to two pages will be visible, with an even numbered page rendered first. Intended to be used where the viewer's ItemsPanelTemplate is set to the FacingPanel layout Panel found in the ReaderControl sample project, with the CoverFacing attribute set to true. (SilverDoxSdk\Samples\ReaderControl\Utility\FacingPanel.cs)

member.name: M:PDFTron.SilverDox.Documents.Document.LoadCanvasAsync(System.Int32,System.Action{PDFTron.SilverDox.Documents.Document.OnLoadCanvasAsyncCallbackArgs},System.Action{PDFTron.SilverDox.Documents.Document.OnLoadCanvasAsyncCallbackArgs},System.Action{PDFTron.SilverDox.Documents.Link})
member.summary: Loads the canvas for a given page number.
member.param: The page number of the requested canvas.
A callback function that is called when the canvas is loaded. Note that canvas may be missing elements, which will be added to the canvas as they are loaded.

member.name: T:PDFTron.SilverDox.Documents.Text.TextSearch
member.summary: TextSearch searches through a for a user-given search pattern. TextSearch provides users with several useful search modes and extra information besides the found string that matches the pattern. TextSearch can either keep running until a matched string is found or be set to return periodically in order for the caller to perform any necessary updates (e.g., UI updates).

member.summary: Constructs a new TextSearch object.
member.param: The that will be searched.

member.summary: Initilizes a new search. To perform a search, it must be followed by at least one call to .
member.param: The search string.
The options for the search, such as search direction and case sensitvity.
The page number of the on which to start the search.

member.name: M:PDFTron.SilverDox.Documents.Text.TextSearch.SearchNextAsync(System.Action{PDFTron.SilverDox.Documents.Text.TextSearch.OnTextSearchAsyncCallbackArgs},System.Object)
member.summary: Attempts to find the next instance of the search string specified in .
member.param: The callback function to call when the search completes. The search may complete when the search term is found, when the entire document has been searched, and, depending on the search options, at the end of every page.
Custom data that will be included in the callback function's arguments.

member.summary: Gets a value that indicates whether the asynchronous operation completed synchronously.

member.summary: If an error has occured, Error contains information about the error; otherwise, Error is null.

member.summary: The page number which the search was conducted on.

member.summary: The reason the search completed.

member.summary: The found text.

member.name: T:PDFTron.SilverDox.Documents.Text.TextSearch.SearchModes
member.summary: Search modes that control how searching is conducted.

member.name: F:PDFTron.SilverDox.Documents.Text.TextSearch.SearchModes.None
member.summary: Default flag, does not alter search mode.

member.name: F:PDFTron.SilverDox.Documents.Text.TextSearch.SearchModes.CaseSensitive
member.summary: If set, the found text must match the case of the search term.

member.name: F:PDFTron.SilverDox.Documents.Text.TextSearch.SearchModes.WholeWord
member.summary: If set, the found text must be a whole word (preceeded and followed by a non-alphabetical character, or in the case of a number, a non-numerical character.

member.name: F:PDFTron.SilverDox.Documents.Text.TextSearch.SearchModes.SearchUp
member.summary: If set, the document pages will be searched in descending order, from bottom to top.

member.name: F:PDFTron.SilverDox.Documents.Text.TextSearch.SearchModes.PageStop
member.summary: If set, the search will return with a result code of Page at the end of every page. Useful for updating the UI.

member.name: F:PDFTron.SilverDox.Documents.Text.TextSearch.SearchModes.ProvideQuads
member.summary: If set, the bounding box the found term will be included. Useful for highlighting text and positioning the page.

member.name: F:PDFTron.SilverDox.Documents.Text.TextSearch.SearchModes.AmbientString
member.summary: If set, the characters surrounding the found term will be included. This gives context to the search result may be useful when providing a list of search results.

member.name: T:PDFTron.SilverDox.Documents.Text.TextSearch.SearchResultCode
member.summary: The code indicating the reason that the search process concluded.

member.name: F:PDFTron.SilverDox.Documents.Text.TextSearch.SearchResultCode.Done
member.summary: Entire document searched.

member.name: F:PDFTron.SilverDox.Documents.Text.TextSearch.SearchResultCode.Page
member.summary: Search reached end of page with no (more) found terms.

member.name: F:PDFTron.SilverDox.Documents.Text.TextSearch.SearchResultCode.Found
member.summary: The search found a match.

member.summary: The search did not find a match.
